title: Dragging open the Joints tab should have a visual clue prior to being "full open"

content.raw:
To open the joints tab you have to:

1. Understand the grab handle affordance
2. Locate and hold over the affordance bounding box and
3. Drag left >120px (half the window width)

(1 and 2 are addressed in a separate ticket.)

A desired behavior option would be that the pane begins to slide open after moving any number of pixels, but on mouse up "snaps" to the full open 240 wide position.

Even if the pane were blank / unpopulated during the slide, this would be a step in improving the usability / discoverability of this feature.
